result.title: Comments improvements
result.content:
I'm glad to announce two new features. Both improvements have repeatedly appeared in discussions on our pages.
  • Now, new comments for you (of course, you must be logged into the system) painted with "sky blue" color. A comment is considered a new five minutes, as you saw it the first time (first view of the post does not count).
  • You may edit your comments. You may use it to change the spelling or grammatical errors, formatting or to do minor fixes. Changing the meaning of a comment is unacceptable. Comments history have navigation to-the-past-and-back, or more precisely to-left-and-right.
I hope that now the discussion on Codeforces become more comfortable. ivan.popelyshev, helped to implement new features. Thanks for his work!

With you high rating,
MikeMirzayanov

The new features are in the testing mode now:)
